claim_summary: CMS’s December 21, 2021 approval letter for the ARHOME demonstration authorizes premium assistance for individuals up to 133% FPL to purchase Qualified Health Plans, allows a 30‑day retroactive eligibility period and temporarily permits premiums up to 2% of income【118221702928095†L16-L39】【118221702928095†L66-L74】.

source.title: CMS Approval Letter – ARHOME Section 1115 Demonstration
